achievement.title: Contributed to the Launch of a High-Security Web Application for a Leading Enterprise
achievement.description: Played a key role as a developer in the successful launch of a secure and hardened web application under strict compliance requirements. Took ownership of high-impact feature development, showcasing leadership and delivering improvements that enhanced user experience and met business objectives.
Achieved certification demonstrating strong foundational knowledge in cybersecurity principles and best practices ahead of schedule, saving project hours and with high accuracy.
Successfully developed and deployed diverse projects, including frontend solutions, full-stack applications, and embedded systems, showcasing adaptability and cross-disciplinary expertise.
Validated comprehensive understanding of cloud computing fundamentals including AWS services, architecture, and deployment.
Worked as a sole developer, an business owner (LLC), and as part of small and large teams, contributing to and thriving in a variety of collaborative environments.
